message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $950000. We believe this is a fair price considering its high quality and the benefits it will bring to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $810000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. After careful consideration, we are willing to negotiate further. Our counteroffer is $840000 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $830000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. Considering the value and quality of the product, we are pleased to offer a price of $835000.
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $825000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. We are willing to consider $830000 as the final price for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $820000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. Considering the value and the discussions we've had, we are willing to accept $825000 as the final price for the product.
